Package game

Class GameLevel

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.GameLevel
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1, Level2, Level3
public abstract class GameLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World
The GameLevel class which adds bodies to the world.
